title: Meet the Somerville couple behind a new affordable soccer club
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Sports News Somerville United FC aims to give adult players a place to keep developing without paying thousands to play.
Somerville United FC was founded by Somerville couple Alesandra Grace Onjiko and Robert Sifa Onjiko.

title: 12 Mass. towns missed the MBTA Communities zoning deadline. What happens now?
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Local News Twelve towns failed to comply with the MBTA Communities Act by the end of 2025.
Now they face legal threats, lost funding, and deep uncertainty.
The Avalon Apartments lie right next to the Norwood MBTA commuter train station.

title: Patriots’ ‘big dogs’ on defense shredded Chargers en route to a playoff victory
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “He started the week by saying, ‘Big dogs show up in January.
’ And I was just preaching that to our group all week.

title: How Mike Vrabel ended up with a bloody lip during Patriots’ playoff win over the Chargers
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "I think I headbutted everybody.
But I forgot Vrabes ain't have no helmet on.
" Mike Vrabel took a football helmet to the face during Sunday's win.

title: The best jokes and brutal roasts from Nikki Glaser’s Golden Globes monologue
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Entertainment Nikki Glaser returned to host the Golden Globes for a second straight year, poking fun at CBS News, Leonardo DiCaprio, and most of all, herself.
Nikki Glaser arrives at the 83rd Golden Globes on Sunday, Jan.
